title: Firefox blue line on new tab
content:
Hello. Whenever that blue broader on the new tab appears, it doesn't let me type on my keyboard and doesn't let me switch to a different tab and open my folder on the desktop whenever I press my keyboard. Does anyone know how to fix this problem?

screenshot is attached.
creator: parkj10102002

title: Update doesn't work
content: The last two times Firefox has updated, it's also stopped working. The problem was the same both times: the app takes several minutes to open and when (if) it does, pages won't load. Any tabs I open remain blank white pages. The first time this happened, the problem fixed itself after a few days. This time I've been unable to use Firefox since the 24 October 2023 update. I've tried updating my OS, uninstalling and reinstalling Firefox, and rebooting several times but nothing has worked. Hope you can help.
creator: emcgiffin

title: all my data extentions bookmarks history has dissapeared??????

title: Help with Address bar
content:
Hi,

I want the Firefox suggestions to show up when I click on the address bar. Currently, it shows up only when I type a letter. I am unable to find the settings for it. I know it's a silly query, but would still appreciate it if it could be answered.

Thanks

title: Inicio de sesion en paginas
content: Buenas noches Me he instalado firefox 2 veces, la primera vez intentaba entrar a ChatGPT (por poner un ejemplo), e iniciaba sesion, no me molesto ya que era la primera vez, pero despues de cerrar el navegador a cada rato tenia que volver a iniciar sesion y es un poco molesto, desactive la opcion de eliminar las cookies despues de que se cerrara el navegador y sigue igual, tambien desactive la opcion de borrar el historial al cerrar y tengo que volver a iniciar sesion en todas las plataformas, espero su ayuda, gracias.
creator: cesr031223

title: My laptop Fiirefox has a tiny white bar at the top with the X, minimize and maximize commands.  How do I make that go away?
content: My laptop Fiirefox has a tiny white bar at the top with the X, minimize and maximize commands. How do I make that go away? (Or come back, if I need it to.) I need the real estate on the laptop, if for no other reason than to shut Messenger down on FB. Presently, I can't access the X to close it. Presently have Win10 on an Acer Spin 3. Thank you, O Knowledgeable Ones.

title: Using backspace key to go back one URL
content: I used to be able to use the backspace key to go back one URL in a given window. Now, even though I have gone to about:config and changed browser.backspace_action = 0 to 'true', this no longer works, at least not with my new Windows 11 computer. I tried closing and re-opening Mozilla with the new preference, and again with closing, restarting the computer, and then re-opening Mozilla. Please help if you can. Thank you so much.
creator: jozierabyor

title: Can the Picture-in-Picture Seek forward/backward Media Controls be customised?
content: By default the Picture-in-Picture Seek forward/backward Media Controls are set to 5 seconds, is there a way to change the 5 second increments to say 10 seconds?

title: Addon for managing large amounts of tabs?

It is information age, we literally work with so many information, yet UI is so moronic it leads to information overload, not to mention i can't work efficiently like this...
